page.title: 17 HOUSING
page.content: ACCORDING TO MIDLOTHIAN DISTRICT COUNCIL HOUSING PLAN 1984-1989 OUTLINE PLANNING PERMISSION HAS BEEN GIVEN FOR A TOTAL OF 95 NEW PRIVATE HOUSES, NAMELY 60 AT ARNISTON,30 AT GREENHALL FARM AND 5 AT POWDERMILL BRAE. THERE ARE PLANS FOR 180 LOCAL AUTHORITY HOUSES AT VICTORIA SYTEET, 122 HOUSING ASSOCIATION HOUSES AT DUNDAS TERRACE AND NEWBYRES AND FINALLY 140 PRIVATE HOUSES AT ARNISTON AND BIRKENSIDE.THE LARGEST SINGLE SITE EARMARKED FOR LOCAL AUTHORITY HOUSING IS AT VICTORIA STREET. THIS SITE WHICH CAN TAKE 180 HOUSES IS OWNED BY THE NATIONAL COAL BOARD AND ARNISTON ESTATES.
